title: Kia partners with Orix to introduce vehicle lease programme
description: Kia India has partnered with Orix auto infrastructure services to launch the 'Kia Lease' program, aiming to provide customers with a hassle-free ownership experience without maintenance, insurance, or resale concerns. The initiative has been rolled out in major cities like Delhi NCR, Mumbai, Hyderabad, Chennai, Bengaluru, and Pune. Kia India anticipates significant growth in the leasing segment, aligning with the global trend and catering to the evolving needs of consumers.
